itunes:author: iBooks
title: Tim Ferriss: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The lifehacking guru talks about his process and his book.
itunes:summary: Tim Ferriss discusses The 4-Hour Body, the result of an obsessive quest to hack the human body. A guru and role model to millions of readers, Ferriss sits for a candid conversation at the Apple Store, SoHo.
itunes:keywords: Tim Ferriss, the four hour body, the four hour work week, 4-hour workweek, four hour workweek, tim feriss, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
